meanings.definition: Of or relating to a zoo.
meanings.sent1: The zooiest animals are the ones that love to be around other animals.
meanings.sent2: The zooiest part of the day is when the visitors arrive and the zoo comes to life.
meanings.sent3: The zooiest gift I ever received was a stuffed animal from the zoo gift shop.
meanings.sent4: Her room was the zooiest place in the house, filled with animal posters and toys.
meanings.sent5: The zooiest smell in the air was the scent of hay and animals on a warm day.

meanings.sent1: The zooiest of all places in town is the wildlife sanctuary.
meanings.sent2: Visiting the zooiest area of the park, we saw monkeys swinging from trees.
meanings.sent3: The zooiest part of the movie was when the characters visited the exotic animal exhibit.
meanings.sent4: Her backyard was the zooiest spot in the neighborhood, with birds chirping and squirrels running around.
meanings.sent5: The zooiest moment of the trip was when we heard the lions roaring in the distance.
